title: THE UNDERDOG
itunes:title: THE UNDERDOG
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
THE UNDERDOG. Andy "Destroyer" Ruiz, Former Unified Heavyweight Champion of the World. He's Back. Ready for War. This is a powerful motivational speech by Motiversity. In 2019, Ruiz became the first Mexican WBO IBF IBO WBA Heavyweight Champion of the World before losing a rematch with Joshua in 2019.


Speaker:


Marcus Taylor: http://bit.ly/38FUFoS​


Music:


Really Slow Motion


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
